alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Northern Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 8:04PM MST until December 27 at 2:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...The Custer County Plains, the Pennington County Plains, Northern Oglala Lakota County, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills and the Southern Meade County Plains. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Northern Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills
